TopicTitle: B787_300 The not so new person

Articles.Content: Well im not new to the game, started just after .15, but have never posted here before. So I am a College Freshman that is studying to become an Aerospace Engineer, go figure right. As stated before I have been playing for a while, just have never posted in here before. I have landed on the Mun and Minimus, but alas both of them were one way tickets, best way to go to get humans to mars soon though. I am currently working on getting a rocket to Eve any interplanetary tips would be useful, also i use mechjeb.

Hi B787_300, welcome to the community

MechJeb currently cannot land on the new planets, unless you like making new craters that is, I suggest you look up the tutorials in the How-To board.
